BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this image appears to be heterogeneously dense, which means that it has a mix of both fatty and dense areas.
FINDINGS: There is an irregularly shaped opacity with ill-defined margins in the upper outer quadrant of the breast. This finding is suggestive of a benign lesion, possibly a fibroadenoma or a complex cyst. However, due to its indeterminate nature and location, short-term follow-up imaging is recommended to confirm stability.
